ingredients.ingredient: 4 slices Nature's Own® Perfectly Crafted White Bread

cookingTips: Use quality dark chocolate that melts smoothly for better texture
Toast the sandwiches over medium heat to prevent burning while the brie melts
Brie should be slightly softened but not fully melted for best results
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a gourmet twist on grilled cheese—sweet meets savory. Do you prefer melted chocolate throughout or in distinct layers?
